study_design.population: 104 patients with first-diagnosed idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM)
study_design.setting: Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University
study_design.duration: January 2014 to December 2017 for patient data collection with follow-up until December 2018

outcome.LVRR: Defined as an absolute increase in LVEF from >10% to a final value >35% and a decrease in LVDd >10%
outcome.non-LVRR: Defined as an absolute increase in LVEF <10%, final value <35%, or a decrease in LVDd <10%

study_design.evaluation_method: 10-fold cross-validation with ROC curves and calibration plot for performance evaluation
study_design.significant_findings: XGBoost outperformed other models in predicting LVRR with higher AU-ROC
